text: In Dash.jl is changing trace labels in a legend possible or is it a WIP type thingy?

elements.text: In Dash.jl is changing trace labels in a legend possible or is it a WIP type thingy?

text: For a plot? Dash uses plotly for plotting, so I imagine everything possible in plotlly should be possible in Dash.

elements.text: For a plot? Dash uses plotly for plotting, so I imagine everything possible in plotlly should be possible in Dash.

text: I thought the same thing, but I tried the Plotly syntax and it didn't work, tried the python syntax that didn't work. Tried to modify my code to match an example in the docs, that didn't work. Tried every permutation of dict, named tuple, list, and plural of the keywords - those didn't work.

elements.text: I thought the same thing, but I tried the Plotly syntax and it didn't work, tried the python syntax that didn't work. Tried to modify my code to match an example in the docs, that didn't work. Tried every permutation of dict, named tuple, list, and plural of the keywords - those didn't work.

text: similarly, I don't think you can add say horizontal lines to plots like you can in plotly or normal Dash.

elements.text: similarly, I don't think you can add say horizontal lines to plots like you can in plotly or normal Dash.

text: so it's a WIP, but I'm not sure whats in progress and whats available

elements.text: so it's a WIP, but I'm not sure whats in progress and whats available

text: There's a Plotly Discourse at <https://community.plotly.com/>. I've already seen Dash.jl questions asked there, so it might be a good idea to ask your question in that forum. You're more likely to find someone there with an answer, when it comes to more complex queries.
